snippet.title: Ninkyo Dantai - New Props & Map Editor | In GameMaker Studio 3D | Action 69, 13.2 #4
snippet.description:
Hi guys, in this video I showcase some of the new props I have modeled. I also show off my Map Editor that is part of the Blackbox Engine suite. 

I still have a lot of polish work for the Map Editor, but it's okay for the time being. 

Some new map-editor features to expect;

•Basic shape support with textures; squares, triangles, cubes, pyramids, cones, spheres, etc
•Saving and loading of placed models
•Ability to select different objects using mouse-wheel
•Selected objects change colour when highlighted
•Better UI and polish work, sliders, buttons, etc
•Many more features to come!

In the next video, you will expect to see a video on an experimental weather system for Ninkyo Dantai starting with misty fog!

Thanks for watching! 
-TeamCS1

(Action 69,  Update 13.2)

Please check out my featured game projects!

➢ Action 69 Forums:  http://action69.boards.net/​
➢ Download Game On Itch.io: https://teamcs1.itch.io/action-69
➢ Game Projects On Itch.io: https://teamcs1.itch.io/
➢ Trello Checklist: https://trello.com/b/ivnJ3nX1/buruwasu-murder-mystery

#action69 #gamemaker3d #gamemaker #ninkyodantai #buruwasu #buruwasumurdermystery
